titleStmt.title: By his Highnes Councill in Scotland, for the government thereof. Although the said council have with some trouble observed, that diverse ministers of this nation, continue to pray in publick for the pretended King ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Christopher Higgins, in Harts-Close, over against the Trone-Church,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Dated at end: Given at Edinburgh the 27. of September, 1655. Signed: in the name, and by order of the Councill. Broghill, President.
Order to print dated: Thursday the 27. September, 1655. Signed: Emanuel Downing, Cl. of the Councill.
Imperfect: cropped with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
